price: Alif-Lam-Mim-Ra. Dies sind die Zeichen des Buches. Was zu dir von deinem Herrn herabgesandt worden ist, ist die Wahrheit. Aber die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
arabic: الٓمٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِۗ وَٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-meem-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi wa-alladhī unzila ilayka min rabbika al-ḥaqu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yu'minūna
